course_description: Reading plays with a view to production. Exercises and projects explore how a text emerges in performance from the combined perspectives of actors, directors, dramaturges, designers, and audiences.
sections: Class Nbr: 4518, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: N. Fesette, Status: Open
